trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when something has gone wrong during remoting.
trans-unit.target: 时出现了问题在远程处理期间，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: RemotingException uses the HRESULT COR_E_REMOTING, which has the value 0x8013150B.
trans-unit.target: RemotingException 使用 HRESULT COR_E_REMOTING，其值 0x8013150B。

trans-unit.source: RemotingException uses the default <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> implementation, which supports reference equality.
trans-unit.target: RemotingException 使用默认<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>支持引用相等性的实现。</xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of RemotingException, see the RemotingException constructors.
trans-unit.target: RemotingException 的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅 RemotingException 构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException"></xref> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException"></xref>使用默认属性的类。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException> inherits from the <xref:System.SystemException> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException>继承<xref:System.SystemException>类。</xref:System.SystemException></xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException> class: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The empty string ("")|
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException>类的实例的初始属性值: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|空字符串 ("") |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException"></xref> class with a specified message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException"></xref>使用指定的消息的类。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException> inherits from the <xref:System.SystemException> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException>继承<xref:System.SystemException>类。</xref:System.SystemException></xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException> class: |Property Type|Condition| |-------------------|---------------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The `message` string|
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException>类的实例的初始属性值: |属性类型 |条件 | |-------------------|---------------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|`message`字符串 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains why the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常发生原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException"></xref> class from serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException"></xref>从序列化数据的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 在反序列化，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象过程中调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: (For more information on serialization, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).)
trans-unit.target: (在序列化的详细信息，请参阅[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。)

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化的对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 有关源或目标的异常的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: The info parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The info parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息和对导致此异常的内部异常的引用的类。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception will include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 前一个异常的直接结果将包含中的前一个异常的引用引发的异常，<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性返回相同的值传递到构造函数中，或`null`如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性不会提供给构造函数的内部异常值。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException> class: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException>类的实例的初始属性值: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|内部异常引用。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|错误消息字符串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains why the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常发生原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the `InnerException` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`InnerException`参数不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>中, 引发当前异常<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>处理内部异常的块。
